#include <iostream>

int main () {

	int testcases;
	std::cin>>testcases;
	int N, A, B, C;
	unsigned long long sum;
	while (testcases--) {
		std::cin>>N>>A>>B>>C;
		sum =0;
		for (int i=0; i<=std::min(A,N); i++) {
			N=N-i;
			for (int j=0; j<=std::min(B,N); j++) {
				N=N-j;
				sum+=((std::min(C,N))+1);
				N=N+j;
			}
			N=N+i;
		}
		std::cout<<sum<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
